meta.description:
- GP1SVAEU

Greenpeace Switzerland activists project messages in various languages outside the WTO building in Geneva. The activity, carried out ahead of a WTO meeting, is in solidarity with the movement to temporarily drop the intellectual property rights on the COVID-19 vaccine and other therapeutics by approving the TRIPS waiver (Agreement on Trade-Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Rights ) so countries can make the shot available to as many people as possible.

title: Greenpeace - Vaccine Projection at WTO in Geneva
